text: This is a list of SpongeBob SquarePants merchandise, including home videos and DVDs, CDs, video games, and books. ==Home video releases== ===Season boxsets=== Boxset DVD release date Out-of-stock date Region 1 Region 2 Region 4 Region 1 The Complete First Season (1999-2000) October 15, 2002 November 7, 2005 November 30, 2006 December 31, 2007 The Complete Second Season (2000-2003) October 28, 2003 October 23, 2006 November 30, 2006 December 2, 2008 The Complete Third Season (2001-2004) September 21, 2004 December 3, 2007 November 8, 2007 December 31, 2009 Season 4 - Volume 1 (2005-2006) March 22, 2005 November 3, 2008 November 7, 2008 April 13, 2010 Season 4 - Volume 2 (2006-2007) April 18, 2006 April 13, 2011 Season 5 - Volume 1 (2007) May 22, 2007 November 16, 2009 December 2, 2009 January 10, 2012 Season 5 - Volume 2 (2007-2009) November 18, 2008 Season 6 - Volume 1 (2008-2009) December 8, 2009 November 29, 2010 December 2, 2010 July 30, 2013 Season 6 - Volume 2 (2008-2010) December 7, 2010 Complete Seventh Season (2009-2011) December 6, 2011 September 17, 2012 September 9, 2012 February 3, 2015 The Complete Eighth Season (2011-2012) March 12, 2013 October 28, 2013 October 30, 2013 TBA The Complete Ninth Season (2012-2017) October 10, 2017 TBA October 7, 2020 The Complete Tenth Season (2016-2017) October 15, 2019 TBA The Complete Eleventh Season (2017-2018) March 31, 2020 TBA The Complete Twelfth Season (2018-2021) January 12, 2021 TBA TBA ===Themed DVDs=== Title Released Out-of-stock date SpongeBob SquarePants: Nautical Nonsense and SpongeBuddies March 12, 2002 December 31, 20078 DVDs are no longer in stores as of December 31, 2007. Features "Ripped Pants", "SB-129", "Texas", "Jellyfishing" and "F.U.N." from season one and "Graveyard Shift", "Something Smells" "Dying for Pie" and "Wormy" from season two, and the world premiere of "Club SpongeBob" from season three. Upon release, the DVD became Nickelodeon's fastest selling title, selling 150,000 copies in the first week. Spongebob SquarePants: SpongeBob SquarePants' Halloween August 27, 2002 Features "Scaredy Pants", "I Was a Teenage Gary" and "Squidward the Unfriendly Ghost" from season one, "Imitation Krabs", "Frankendoodle", "The Secret Box", "Band Geeks" and "Welcome to the Chum Bucket" from season two and "My Pretty Seahorse" and "Idiot Box" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: Sea Stories November 5, 2002 Features "Pickles" and "Jellyfish Jam" from season one, "Hooky" "Gary Takes a Bath", "Life of Crime", "No Free Rides" and "Sailor Mouth" from season two and "No Weenies Allowed" and "The Algae's Always Greener" from season three. Also included is "Shanghaied" from season two with three different endings. SpongeBob SquarePants: Tales from the Deep January 28, 2003 Features "Hall Monitor", "Valentine's Day", "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy", "Tea at the Treedome" and "The Paper" from season one and "SpongeBob's House Party", "I Had an Accident", "Just One Bite" and "Born Again Krabs" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: Lost at Sea March 4, 2003 Features "Plankton!", "Boating School", "Suds", and "The Chaperone" from season one, "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy II" "Bubble Buddy", "Your Shoe's Untied" and "Pre-Hibernation Week" from season two and "The Sponge Who Could Fly" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: Tide and Seek July 29, 2003 Features "Opposite Day" and "Sleepy Time" from season one, "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy III", "Big Pink Loser", "Squirrel Jokes", "Dumped", "Bossy Boots" and "Squidville" from season two and "Rock-a-Bye Bivalve" and "The Bully" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: SpongeBob SquarePants' Christmas September 30, 2003 Features "Pizza Delivery" and "Squeaky Boots" from season one, "Christmas Who?", "Procrastination" and "Survival of the Idiots" from season two and "Snowball Effect", "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy IV", "Chocolate with Nuts" and "As Seen on TV" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: The Seascape Capers January 6, 2004 June 29, 2008 Features "Bubblestand" from season one; "Artist Unknown", "The Fry Cook Games", "Squid's Day Off", "Grandma's Kisses", "Krusty Love" and "The Smoking Peanut" from season two; "Krab Borg" from season three and "SpongeBob Meets a Strangler", and "Pranks a Lot" from season four. SpongeBob SquarePants: SpongeBob Goes Prehistoric March 9, 2004 Features "Nature Pants", "Fools in April" from season one, "I'm with Stupid", "Patty Hype" from season two and "Ugh", "Squid on Strike", "The Great Snail Race", "Plankton's Army" and "Squilliam Returns" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: SpongeGuard on Duty June 1, 2004 July 8, 2008 Features "Naughty Nautical Neighbors" and "Walking Small" from season one, "Pressure" and "Jellyfish Hunter" from season two and "SpongeGuard on Duty", "Nasty Patty", "Doing Time" and "Clams" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: Sponge for Hire November 2, 2004 September 23, 2008 Features "Krusty Krab Training Video", "Wet Painters", "Can You Spare a Dime?", "New Student Starfish", "Missing Identity", "Mid-Life Crustacean", "Krabby Land" and "The Camping Episode" all from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: Home Sweet Pineapple January 4, 2005 December 31, 2008 Features "Home Sweet Pineapple", "Ripped Pants", "Sandy's Rocket", "Culture Shock", "MuscleBob BuffPants" and "Employee of the Month" from season one and "Band Geeks" and "Sandy, SpongeBob, and the Worm" from season two. SpongeBob SquarePants: Fear of a Krabby Patty February 24, 2004 Features "Arrgh!", "Neptune's Spatula" and "Karate Choppers" from season one, "I'm Your Biggest Fanatic" from season two, "One Krab's Trash" and "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy V" from season three and "Fear of a Krabby Patty" and "Shell of a Man" from season four. SpongeBob SquarePants: Absorbing Favorites October 12, 2004 March 24, 2009 Features "Ripped Pants", "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy" and "Karate Choppers" from season one, "Gary Takes a Bath", "Jellyfish Hunter" and "The Fry Cook Games" from season two and "Club SpongeBob", "Plankton's Army" and "The Sponge Who Could Fly" from season three. SpongeBob SquarePants: Where's Gary May 25, 2004 May 5, 2009 Features "The Great Snail Race" from season three and "Have You Seen This Snail?", "The Lost Mattress", "Skill Crane", "Krabs vs. Plankton" and "Good Neighbors" from season four. SpongeBob SquarePants: Lost in Time February 21, 2006 Features "Dunces and Dragons", "Selling Out", "Funny Pants", "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy VI: The Motion Picture", "Enemy In-Law" and "Patrick SmartPants" all from season four. Karate Island September 28, 2004 September 2, 2009 Features "SquidBob TentaclePants", "Krusty Towers", "Mrs. Puff, You're Fired", "Ghost Host", "Wishing You Well", "Karate Island" and "New Leaf" all from season four Whale of a Birthday February 15, 2005 September 29, 2009 Features "All That Glitters", "Whale of a Birthday", "Once Bitten", "Chimps Ahoy", "Bummer Vacation", "Wigstruck" and "That's No Lady" all from season four. Friend or Foe? July 12, 2005 January 12, 2010 Features "Friend or Foe", "Night Light", "The Original Fry Cook", "Waiting", "Rise and Shine", "Fungus Among Us" and "Spy Buddies" all from season five. Bikini Bottom Adventures June 5, 2007 June 1, 2010 Features "Boat Smarts", "Good Ol' Whatshisname", "New Digs", "Krabs à la Mode", "Roller Cowards", "Bucket Sweet Bucket" and "Breath of Fresh Squidward" all from season five. Atlantis SquarePantis November 13, 2007 August 17, 2010 Features "Atlantis SquarePantis", "Money Talks", "SpongeBob vs. the Patty Gadget", "Slimy Dancing", "The Krusty Sponge", "Sing a Song of Patrick" and "Picture Day" all from season five. To Love a Patty January 29, 2008 December 21, 2010 Features "To Love a Patty", "A Flea in Her Dome", "Mermaid Man vs. SpongeBob", "Le Big Switch", "The Donut of Shame", "BlackJack" and "Blackened Sponge" all from season five. Pest of the West April 15, 2008 Features "Pest of the West", "The Krusty Plate", "Pat No Pay", "The Inmates of Summer", "To Save a Squirrel", "20,000 Patties Under the Sea" and "The Battle of Bikini Bottom" all from season five. WhoBob WhatPants? October 14, 2008 January 11, 2011 Features "WhoBob WhatPants?", "Goo Goo Gas", "The Two Faces of Squidward", and "SpongeHenge", from season five and "Banned in Bikini Bottom" and "Stanley S. SquarePants" from season six' Spongicus January 27, 2009 April 5, 2011 Features "Spongicus", "Suction Cup Symphony", "House Fancy", "Krabby Road", "Penny Foolish", "Nautical Novice", "Not Normal" and "Gone" all from season six. SpongeBob vs. The Big One March 3, 2009 Features "SpongeBob vs. The Big One", "A Life in a Day", "Sun Bleached", "Giant Squidward", "No Nose Knows", "The Patty Caper" and "Plankton's Regular" all from season six. To SquarePants or Not to SquarePants July 21, 2009 July 31, 2012 Features "To SquarePants or Not to SquarePants", "Squid's Visit", "The Splinter", "Slide Whistle Stooges", "Boating Buddies", "The Krabby Kronicle", "The Slumber Party" and "Grooming Gary" all from season six. Truth or Square November 10, 2009 August 21, 2012 Features "Truth or Square" from season seven. "Porous Pockets", "Choir Boys", "Krusty Krushers" and "The Card" all from season six. Viking-Sized Adventures January 26, 2010 December 9, 2012 Features "Dear Vikings", "Ditchin'", "Grandpappy the Pirate", "Cephalopod Lodge", "Shuffleboarding", "Professor Squidward"all from season 6. "Pineapple Fever", and "Chum Caverns" all from season 7 SpongeBob's Last Stand March 16, 2010 Features "SpongeBob's Last Stand" Special from season seven, and "Pet or Pests", "Komputer Overload", "Guillible Pants","Overbooked","No Hat for Pat", "The Toy Store of Doom" from season six. Triton's Revenge July 13, 2010 February 5, 2013 Features "The Clash of Triton", "Sand Castles in the Sand", "Shell Shocked", "Chum Bucket Supreme", "Single Cell Anniversary" "Tentacle- Vision", and "I Heart Dancing" all from Season 7. 10 Happiest Moments September 14, 2010 January 31, 2012 Features "Tea at the Treedome", "Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy", "Culture Shock", "Karate Choppers" and "Help Wanted" from season one, "Graveyard Shift" and "Christmas Who?" from season two, "The Algae's Always Greener", "Just One Bite" and "No Weenies Allowed" from season three and "Roller Cowards" from season five. Legends of Bikini Bottom November 16, 2010 November 12, 2013 Features "The Monster Who Came to Bikini Bottom", "Welcome to the Bikini Bottom Triangle" from Season 7. "The Main Drain", "Trench Billies", "Sponge-Cano!", "The Curse of the Hex" all from Season 8. The Great Patty Caper March 8, 2011 December 31, 2013 Features "The Great Patty Caper" from Season 8. "Growth Spout", "Stuck in the Wringer", "Someone's in the Kitchen with Sandy", "The Inside Job", "Greasy Buffoons" and "Model Sponge" all from Season 7. Heroes of Bikini Bottom June 14, 2011 Features " Back to the Past", "The Bad Guy Club For Villains", "Keep Bikini Bottom Beautiful", "A Pal For Gary", "Yours, Mine and Mine", "Kracked Krabs", " A Day Without Tears" and "Summer Job" all from season 7 episodes and bonus episode from "T.U.F.F. Puppy". 'SpongeBob’s Runaway Roadtrip September 20, 2011 July 8, 2014 Features "Hide and Then What Happens?", and "Shellback Shenanigans", "A SquarePants Family Vacation", "Patrick’s Staycation", "Walking the Plankton", all from season 8. "Mooncation" "Mr. Krabs Takes a Vacation" from season 9. Holidays with SpongeBob! November 15, 2011 Features 3 SpongeBob DVD's, "Halloween", "Christmas", and "To Love A Patty". Frozen Face-Off January 3, 2012 December 16, 2014 Features "Frozen Face-Off", "Accidents Will Happen", "The Other Patty", "Drive Thru", "The Hot Shot", "A Friendly Game", and "Sentimental Sponge" all from Season 8. Also features four bonus episodes from "T.U.F.F. Puppy" and "Fanboy and Chum Chum". Ghoul Fools August 28, 2012 Features "Ghoul Fools", "The Curse of Bikini Bottom", "Ghost Host", "Arrgh!", "Your Shoe's Untied", and "Money Talks". * NOTE: All SpongeBob SquarePants DVD's and VCD's for the Philippine market licensed and distribution agreement with Viva Entertainment's home video affiliate, Viva Video, Inc. ===VHS releases=== * Nautical Nonsense (January 25, 2005) (Ripped Pants,
